t: Distant Rabbit Games | Board Game Publisher | BoardGameGeek
s: Distant Rabbit Games is a small publishing company located in Athens, GA and specializing in semi-cooperative social deduction games. The company's first game, Mantis Falls, was published in 2020. Distant Rabbit is co-owned by Adrian Kerrihard (game designer) and Juli Bierwirth (illustrator).

We are a small tabletop game company located in Athens, Georgia. We focus on fitting deep strategy, world immersion and player psychology into small packages. In collaboration with myclimate.org, every game we produce is carbon neutral.
